title: Is a MacBook or Windows laptop better for astrophotography?
description: Both Windows and MacBooks have advantages for astrophotography, but the choice will depend on your power level and budget.
content: Both Windows and MacBooks have advantages for astrophotography, but the choice will depend on your power level and budget.
